prompt: Je ne reçois pas de notifications.
expected_answer: Assurez-vous que les notifications sont activées. Vous pouvez les activer en définissant la propriété `notifications.enabled` dans `xwiki.properties` sur `true`. De plus, assurez-vous que vous suivez les pages ou les utilisateurs dont vous souhaitez recevoir des notifications. Vous pouvez suivre une page, une page et ses enfants, ou un wiki entier. Pour suivre un emplacement, il vous suffit d'y aller, puis de cliquer sur le menu "alerte" (représenté par une cloche) et d'activer les notifications souhaitées. Pour suivre un utilisateur, si vous allez sur le profil d'un utilisateur, en utilisant l'index utilisateur par exemple, vous pouvez décider de suivre l'utilisateur. Cela signifie que vous recevrez toutes les notifications concernant les événements déclenchés par cet utilisateur. Dans votre profil utilisateur, si vous allez dans l'onglet "réseau", vous pouvez voir la liste des utilisateurs que vous suivez et les événements qui ont été effectués par eux.
ai_answer:
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiSyntax/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiRESTfulAPI 


It seems like you're having trouble with notifications on XWiki. I found some information that might be helpful.

In XWiki, notifications about events happening in the wiki can be displayed using the [Notifications Application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/). This application is designed to keep you updated about various activities on the wiki.

If you're not receiving any notifications, there might be an issue with your notification preferences. Here are some XWiki documentation pages that might help you:

- [Notifications](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiSyntax/#HNotifications-Notifications)
- [Notifications Applications Preferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsApplicationsPreferencesMacro)
- [Notifications Auto Watch Preferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsAutoWatchPreferencesMacro)
- [Notifications Custom Filters Preferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsCustomFiltersPreferencesMacro)
- [Notifications Email Preferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsEmailPreferencesMacro)

These pages will help you understand and configure your notification settings. If you're still having issues, it might be a good idea to check the [XWiki community forums](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Forums) for assistance.

As for the XWiki RESTful API, it is used for managing wikis and interacting with their content through HTTP requests. However, it doesn't seem directly related to your issue with notifications. If you have any questions about the XWiki RESTful API, feel free to ask!

sources.content:
| [notifications](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/Macro/NotificationsMacro) | Notifications | Notifications | Display notifications about events happened on the wiki. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsApplicationsPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsApplicationsPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Applications Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification applications. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsAutoWatchPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsAutoWatchPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Auto Watch Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about auto watched pages. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsCustomFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsCustomFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Custom Filters Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the given user about custom notification filters. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsEmailPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsEmailPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Email Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification emails. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Filters Preferences (deprecated) | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification filters.This macro is now deprecated in favor of Custom Notifications Filters Preferences or System Notifications Filters Preferences. | Current Wiki |

Display notifications about events happening in the wiki.

![invitation.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Invitation%20Application/invitation.png?rev=1.3)

[Invitation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Invitation%20Application)  
Allows users to send emails, inviting friends and colleagues to join a wiki

# Other Features

Other features can be added to your wiki by [installing](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension%20Manager%20Application) extensions not listed above. Check the [Extensions wiki](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/) for a full list of available extensions.

### /wikimanager (This resource is only available when using the [multi-wiki](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Wiki%20Application) feature)

* **HTTP Method:** POST
	+ **Accepted Media types:**
		- application/xml (Wiki element)
	+ **Media types:**
		- application/xml (Wiki element)
	+ **Query parameters**
		- template  - the wiki template to be used for initializing the wiki.
		- history={RESET/REPLACE/ADD} - history importing
	+ **Description:** create a new wiki.
	+ **Status codes:**
		- 200: If the request was successful.

## Space resources

### /wikis/{wikiName}/spaces[?start=offset&number=n]

* **HTTP Method:** GET
	+ **Media types:**
		- application/xml (Spaces element)
	+ **Description:** Retrieves the list of spaces available in the {wikiName} wiki.
	+ **Status codes:**
		- 200: If the request was successful.

### /wikis/{wikiName}/spaces/{spaceName}[/spaces/{nestedSpaceName}]\*/search?q={keywords}[[&scope={name,content,title,objects}...]&number=n]

* **HTTP Method:** GET
	+ **Media types:**
		- application/xml (Search results element)
	+ **Description:** The list of pages and objects that contain the {keywords} in the specified {scope}s. Multiple scopes can be specified. Search results are relative to space {spaceName}
	+ **Status codes:**
		- 200: If the request was successful.
		- 401: If the user is not authorized.

## Page resources

### /wikis/{wikiName}/spaces/{spaceName}[/spaces/{nestedSpaceName}]\*/pages[?start=offset&number=n]

* **HTTP Method:** GET
	+ **Media types:**
		- application/xml (Pages element)
	+ **Description:** The list of pages in the space {spaceName}
	+ **Status codes:**
		- 200: If the request was successful.
		- 401: If the user is not authorized.
